about_the_game:
Endeavor Is A 3d Deep Space Adventure.

Your purpose is to explore, investigate, gather, build and battle your way through the unknown frontiers of infinite space-time.

Explore an infinite universe

  • Traverse vast, procedurally generated galaxies teeming with undiscovered sectors of space.

  • Encounter diverse topologies from asteroid belts to solar systems and explore the planets, suns, asteroids, and meteors of deep space.

Gather resources

  • Mine valuable resources from planets, asteroids, and meteors.

  • Collect rare materials to trade and build advanced items.

Ensure your survival

  • Manage your ship's systems, including life support, energy, shields, and weapons.

  • Overcome unknown challenges as you traverse through deep space where all entities have gravitational pull.

Choose your adventure

  • Engage in dynamic, real-time combat against hostile entities.

  • Choose your own path as you journey through Deep Space.

Endeavor offers a vast, immersive universe to explore, filled with challenges, discoveries, and opportunities to shape your future. With its deep gameplay mechanics, stunning visuals, and engaging narrative, Endeavor invites you to embark on an unforgettable journey through the cosmos.

name: Endeavor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure. Explore, Gather, Build and Battle your way through the unknown frontiers of deep space.
